reviews.review_text: I disliked the way the delivery person had just set the package down knocked on the door and ran off but other than that the beats are amazing and play good as well.

The sound is so clear and you can hear it as loud as you want. I love the way the cushion is so soft on the ears. The headset is very comfortable. I'm very happy with my purchase, especially with the price I paid and I didn't have to charge it every day. Lol

Got this during Black Friday deals 2022 for $89. Picked up at the Gurnee Store. Box was completely sealed. Everything was intacked. Sounds great! Its the same
quality as an airpods. Reason for getting it was its on a great price. So happy with the purchased.

These headphones were a gift to my 14 year old daughter. I had no idea how much she would love them, until she took them out of the box. The controls are on the headphones. She can call out to another phone with them and talk. They are small and soft on her ears. It blocks out noise and the music is clear.  It also has a case so she can easily store them and travel with them. I have to say it is impressive. I am so glad we bought them.

Amazing sound quality and good bass! (I was skeptical at first but these are the official Beats by Dre.) The rose gold color is sleek and nice. The size is a bit smaller than I expected but still great. Only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because of the ear cover area: after about 10 minutes of listening to music (at an average volume, not too loud) the ear cushion area starts to push pressure on the outer parts of the ears and cause a serious ache. Other than that, the headphobes are a great buy.

I brought the headphone in December and it's just April and the headphone is not even working no more and I cannot even exchange it so I like to know what can I do because I did spend some money on that and my daughter needed it for school so what can I do?

I had my heart set on these for some time. I noticed the sale and splurged on myself to get them. I followed the setup instructions. I charged and connected them. I was only able to use them briefly within a 24 hour span. They quit charging, turning on, and I got nowhere with trying to connect with a tech specialist on their website to troubleshoot the issue. Walmart was amazing in response to their 30-day return policy. I got my money back on a gift card to go towards my next order. Instead I was gifted a pair of Sony Headphones for Xmas. A brief plug for them. They are 1000% times better than the Beats in every way!!From ear comfort/coverage, to sound quality, battery life, and tech specs. I highly recommend checking out the Sony WH-1000XM4. Granted they are more in price and definitely worth every penny!!!

literally received broken headphones i was already upset because they wouldn't deliver my package because it required a signature and was not able to sign because i was at work every time they tried to deliver it and then i finally figured out how to be able to have it held somewhere so i can pick it up and when i open it the headphone are broken in half i should have known because the box was damaged also but never ordering anything like this from walmart again
Beats stopped working after 2 months They say their bot charge but i charge them and they just won't work They won't connect to my phone anymore either

I purchased these beats as a gift, upon receiving them I was extremely disappointed. Add to the frustration the seller had the nerve to claim they didn't send the headphones. In my opinion. The whole company seems to be a scam, I would never order from this company again.

Amazing sound quality and bass! The rose gold color is sleek and shiny. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because of the ear cover area: after about 10 minutes of listening to music, the ear cushion part of the headphones start to ache the outer parts of my ears. Other than that, the headphones are a great buy.

They're not as loud as the beats studios but they're very loud. I like how it doesn't hug my ear. I feel like they're MUCH more comfortable to sleep in than the studio (talking from experience). I love that the bag has a pink logo on it. I love it overall!
I like everything about them except there are two cons they make your ears sore after 10 min and they aren't as loud as I expected beats headphones to be
The beat headphones are quite loverly they're loud and the rose pink looking color is pretty, but the white gets dirty too fast and the cushion for your ears gets scrunchy fast.
reviews.review_title: Overall it a good product to buy and I give a 9

reviews.review_text: I bough this model for Christmas but the size of the ear pads are too small and end up hurting after a while. I am guessing this are made more for a child than for an adult.

reviews.review_text: Beautiful Christmas and birthday gift got it for my babe she going to be so excited
My son really loves his headphones
It's beautiful and worth it.â¤ï¸
I loved this because they are loud and noise canceling
i love my beats.
My son love his beats 3 he was so excited when he saw them great product nice sound long lasting battery for hours of listening just overall great
Didn't dislike anything !! They are great comes with charger cord, no box. But I knew that. Love love love getting my brother a pair !

hehe amazing!

It is definitely one of the best you can buy, they are super comfortable, its battery is super durable, it lasts for months on charge, that is too fantastic, I have never seen anything like it, the sound is super clean, it sounds super good, my husband is delightedâ¤ï¸

Love these headphones but there are very painful to âbreak inâ due to being made so tight. Now that they are broken in they feel and sound great. I also love that they are noise canceling so I don't head anything but my music or book. 4 stars instead of 5 because breaking them in really sucked. I almost returned them. Glad I decided to stick out the pain.
reviews.review_title: Great when they are broken in

reviews.review_text: I have had my Beats Solo 3 by Dre wireless headphones for a few years now and they are still just as great. I love that they are wireless and have a long range so I can set my phone down and walk around the house still connected and listening to music. The sound quality is amazing with great clarity and also have great noise blocking for outside sound. These also are super easy to connect even to things like my TV for while i am playing video games. They are super comfortable to wear and the battery still lasts up to 40 hours before they need charged again. I would definitely recommend these!
Best headphones right now ð
Their a lot smaller than I thought but I don't mind it I actually I like it
I love the sound on them !
Refurbished and still works great, has held up great . You the know beats sound is always great
Came in quick and the box is in very nice condition
I'm an Apple product person, and I LOVE music. What else can I say? Thanks, Dre. I got 2
Came very fast
reviews.review_title: I love and it look just like the picture

reviews.review_text: I like them
thank yall ð
Got a used item. The exterior looks clean but yheears arw filthy.

These headphones sound great. The music quality is amazing. They are very comfortable to wear and are perfect for music and gaming. The battery lasts a long time and you can still use them while they charge. I wear them to the gym too and they are great at noise cancelling.

I absolutely love these headphones. I have had them for about 4 years now and they never let me down. The charge lasts for SO LONG! The sound quality is excellent and the noise cancellation can not be beat!
I loved these headphones but the only bad thing was that they randomly stopped working and only turn on when they want to and I only had these for 4 months
reviews.review_title: Be careful cause they may not last for a long time

client_responses.response: Thanks for the review! All accessories come with a 1 year manufacturers warranty. ^KO

reviews.review_text: Today Nov 26 I received my Package and it shows Signs of water on the inside of the plastic wrapper I did not want to open The Package because it is a Christmas gift maybe they should be more careful with things that are electronic.  thanks
They were ok but not my preference. For some reason they werenât as loud as I expected. I could still hear everything else and the volume was at max. They sound great but I prefer my AirPods still.

We have the Beats Solo 3-club collection in blue and red. And they are great. We have had them for about 5 years and they are still holding up. My son likes them for car rides because he's able to block out excess noise. He likes them for laying on his iPad or just for quiet. The noise cancellation is great.

These are my favorite headphones to use for travel. The battery life is amazing! I literally only use these for travel and the battery holds up months between uses. They are comfortable to wear and I have big hair lol. The sound quality is great and they pair well with any product, especially Apple.

These headphones are great. The sound quality is awesome and it is great for the price. The bluetooth works perfectly and it syncs easily with my phone. The battery life is great. I also use it for zoom calls and don't have any complaints. I am very happy with my purchase and would highly recommend this product.

Product is awesome very pretty. It have truly transformed the way I enjoy music and audio. It have long listining time. Whether I'm working, exercising, or just relaxing with my favorite tunes. The battery life is impressive, easily lasting through a full day of heavy use.
It's very good!

I wanted these headphones so bad so I purchased them for myself as a birthday gift. The left side stopped working after a month. I was super careful with them and don't know how they would get a short. Overall not worth the money spent. I'm disappointedâ¦
Cute %26 great sounding!

Love love love my beats, I have had them for 6 years now and they have held up great! I do need new padding on the inside but the sound quality and battery life still is great after all these years. Also love all of the different color ways!

Best headphones ever! I literally takes these with me everywhere. The sound quality is so good (very clear and can get VERY loud) and they last for so long. I recently went on an international trip for a week without the charger and they lasted the entire time. They're pretty comfortable, but after a while they begin to hurt my ears. Besides that, these headphones are perfect.

It is simple to charge and connect, and a travel bag is included to store the cable when not in use. Good sound, however since they don't have noise cancellation function, it doesn't filter out noise, you can probably still hear everything around you and can't really appreciate the song. After less than a year of use, the ear cushions have begun to come apart due to their terrible quality. Long-term wear if it is painful as well. You get what you pay.

These are superior sound quality! You really haven't experienced sound like this before it's amazing! They are lightweight and extremely comfortable. The battery life is well over 24 hours. The only bad thing is after using them for awhile the headphones start to show major wear and tear especially the ear part.  Maybe if you don't use them everyday they'll hold up better. But overall I highly recommend them.

client_responses.name: Andria
client_responses.response: We appreciate you sharing your review!

reviews.review_text: I love them so much they are perfect no bad reviews over here I might end up getting another pair for my brother but I js love them!!!!good sound and I love the color

They are worth the money and the quality is very good. I also got them for 100 dollars wich is very good because the usually are 120-160. I would also recommend getting a protection plan just in case anything happens.
Purchased these during Black Friday $79 For my 11/13/17 yr old Since They Alway On TikTok or some gaming app!Great choice Battery life is amazing They even use at School!

The Solo Beat3 headset is a great headset especially for listening to Caribbean compagnie beats. It reminded when I was a Radio announcer at  17 years of age working my very first professional job with Radio Citadel of Cape Haitian,  using product headset on the job.

Walmart uses out source delivery and the driver brought a 3$ trash can instead of the headphones I contacted Walmart customer service drove to the store showed the manager the videos of the driver from my ring camera and got sent home to call customer service again and the ending result was I cannot get a refund I have to write a police report and wait for metro to get my refund from the driver never shopping with Walmart again. The drivers name is ashia watch out for her and please continue to report her!

I like the clear sound the music and how it's easy to talk on the phone with the headphones. I do however wish they were a bit louder because certain times if I'm around other noises then those noises are louder. But also do enjoy wants you charge them to 100% they are good for days before you have to charge them again.

I recently purchased the Beats Solo 3 headphones with high hopes, as a fan of the Beats product line. However, my experience has been rather disappointing due to the flimsy build of these headphones. From the moment I started using them, it was evident that the durability was lacking. The materials used feel fragile and not up to the standards I had expected from a brand like Beats. As someone who values both quality sound and sturdiness, it's disheartening to see a product fall short in the latter aspect. While I appreciate the audio performance, the Solo 3 headphones are not suitable for those seeking headphones that can withstand a bit of daily rough handling.
Love these headphones ! Work great and stay on while working out
They work perfect. And are loud and noise canceling
i randomly jus wanted beats n now i never take em off
These headphones can go for days on one charge. Have had them for almost 10 days and they still haven't died. I love them, great sound quality.
Always been a fan Beats! From the Beats Pill, which I still have, to finally getting some headphones!
Noise cancellation was one of the features listed for this item. However, it does not have noise cancellation! Very disappointed!!!
Nice product, I use it daily. Good quality sound. I do a lot of skype. I also use it a lot for video's and zoom. I would recommend this product.
i love beats, their so nice
they are perfect they sound like surround sound and they are loud but not loud loud they tune everything out you cant hear anything i love them
The sounds of the beats are amazing lol I can't hear nobody when im in my zone listening to my peace ð¥°
Honestly I have nothing negative to say about these, the charge on the beats are great. The sound is amazing, they are comfortable and adjustable.
wanted these for sooo long and there pinkkkkk 10/10 buy. they charge fast asf and the battery lasts allll day and i use them for like 8-10 hours straight!! must get good base and quality!

I bought my headphones in the store and haven't put them down not one time sound quality is phenomenal and I love how long the batter  last without charging it for so long. Get it , it will definitely be worth your money !

It was supposed to be a Christmas gift (fiancÃ©) but he got to the package first. He said they are perfect size, stay in at the gym and they stay charged. They also go loud enough for him!! He really enjoys them.

I like these because of their sound quality. Easily the best sound out of any headphones I've ever tried including earbuds. You have enough treble and the bass and especially the mid bass is incredible. If you don't like the way these sound there is something wrong with your ears. The Bluetooth battery lasts forever and charges quick. These are definitely worth getting. They will be all you use. These sound good with metal, edm and rap everything sounds good. I had the solo 2 wired ones they are similar sound. I loved those, that's why I bought these. I recommend these for any average music enjoyer to the point I think your missing out if you don't have them. I use them every day. I hope they make these forever and never discontinue this headphones it is a timeless design! Thanks apple for designing these awesome headphones. The price is affordable too compared to other headphones. I recommend buying a 3.5 to 3.5 mm cable to use it wired too. Excuse the poor quality pic. These look good in black!

loved them, they were loud and pretty!!
i love everything about my beats , the shipping on took 2 days and great customer service !

Serious was terrible. I was sent the wrong headphones and Walmart wouldn't exchange out the wrong item for the right item knowing they sent out the wrong item service was terrible overall.

Everything was perfect. From ordering to delivery.  Product was just like it was advertised.  She was very happy with her gift. Haven't stopped using since she got them. Battery life is awesome.  Would purchase it again.
These are an everyday use for me. I'm in landscaping so to be able to block out most of the noise without noise canceling is awesome. Comfortable over the ear and the battery life is fantastic.
reviews.review_title: You'd be disappointed if you didn't buy them!

reviews.review_text: Brought these Solo Beats for my husband and he likes them. Although I ordered another one that was on sale during the Christmas rush, paid for them only for Walmart to tell me they were unavailable after I paid for them. Then got the run around to get my money back. It was a learning experience and headache , cause the ones I ordered I did not get and was replaced with a lesser quality for the greater amount . ð

I strongly love these headphones they last a long time on one charge and charge quickly. they're great for when you want to work out or even for if you want to have headphones on on a low settings so you can hear your surroundings also great for turning up so you can drown things out.

Love  the sound , the balance of bass and treble. It's bring out every single detail in each instrument of beats . Paradise to the ears . Only negative , the cushion should be bigger for more comfort , seem to hurt the ears after a Hour or 2 of use continuously. A great 4.3

This is our second pair of Beats headphones. The 1st pair lasted my teen boy 6 years. I highly recommend these- the price is good and they are absolutely 100% worth it! Before buying Beats, we would go through several pairs of $40-$70 headphones each year. Highly recommend!
reviews.review_title: Great Price for great headphones that last forever

reviews.review_text: so far these have been great! my daughter uses head phones constantly and we have gone thru many head phones this year. i decided to buy a more expensive pair and she loves these. the fact you can fold them up and put them in the case is awsome and helps her better take care of her head phones.

during seasons like Valentines Day and Christmas. I've noticed that when you advertise high demand items online for one price, you'd accept the online order then minutes later you'll cancel the order and then after hours of back n forth online, conveniently you'll be told that you'd have to purchase items in the store and when you get there the item is there in the store but no longer for the sale price.

Oh, Beats headphones are awesome! They deliver incredible sound quality and have a sleek design. Whether you're listening to music, watching movies, or gaming, Beats headphones provide an immersive audio experience. Plus, they come in different models and colors, so you can find one that matches your style. Trust me, you'll love the way your music sounds with Beats!

The quality of sound is amazing, and the noise canceling feature works great. I left my phone in the house without thinking and walked out to the garage and the headset stayed connected. Was really impressed with that far of a range. Would definitely suggest this purchase.

I bought these headphones because they were on sale, hoping to like them. After wearing them for a couple hours I came to the realization that they extremely uncomfortable. The cushioning is not cushioning. The sound is decent, the bass is ok, but overall they are subpar and I will be returning them.

I disliked being lied to by a manager. The. lie wasnt even necessary, the individual that supposely delivered the item didn't.  They lied about they were on there way back to bring the item it never happened. The last oerson I spoke with I told her I would come that evening to pick up the item because I needed the item that day. She assured me they were going to bring the items. It NEVER happened.  I end up going the next morning and demanded my item!!! 
My experience  on this SUCKED!! 
Do better WALMART or get off the pot.
reviews.review_title: I didnt want to give them any stars!

reviews.review_text: Ordering from the website was easy. Unfortunately, I didn't receive the item I ordered. I know that it couldn't have been delivered by the USPS or FEDEX because those couriers use the ParcelPending lockers in the condominium. The deliver may have been new or contracted because the package was left in the lobby where there are signs posted, âCouriers, do not leave packages in lobby. Please use ParcelPending lockers.â I contacted customer service and spoke with Unaid who was very attentive and was able to assist with my concern. Other than not receiving the product, I would recommend Walmart.com to others and will continue using the website but will opt to pick up orders from store.

never got it very very unhappy my kids will not have their Christmas gifts at all and I started early so it would be in time I got it doing black Friday when sales were going on and now I had nothing no one could help me because Walmart said it was not through them  it was a third-party that I do not know or I would never have ordered it from them the diver company never heard of them before was not ups or FedEx so post office said they never got it and the tracking number the post office said they didn't put that type of number in their system there number start with a different set of numbers so at this point im very mad upset because I still don't have my kids' gifts and no one can help me been  going to the post office every day since November 25 still have not got it and they keep saying it not there I call Walmart they say they cannot do nothing but give me a number to call third party people but still no one can help so at this point my kids out of a gifts and I loss money Very dissatisfant and from this Experience I Probably will not order from Walmart again i will put one star for the things that i did get but my daughter headphone and my other daughter camera very unhappy Customer mad
reviews.review_title: very unhappy never got them or my Camera

reviews.review_text: Overall the product is good. they work perfectly fine. loud, and in great shape. Only i was missing things. I didnt have the charger or the case for the beats. The package for the charger was inside but was ripped up.. when i tried to do an exchange they told me I couldnt since I got them on sale , and I would have to pay the differenceâ¦ even though they didnt come brand new.

I bought several sets for my kids and nephew as a last minute giftâ¦ it turned out to be their favorite Christmas gift! They are amazing!! I used to always use cheap earbuds but wanted something special for the kids! They are so crisp and clearâ¦ I can't wait to get a set for myself!

I ordered the headset along with a hoverboard cart for my granddaughter for Xmas.  The large box was then put in my garage and the gift was decided given to her for her Birthday (2/17) yesterday. When I opened the large Walmart box I only found the hoverboard go cart and 45 air filled plastic cushions and no headset. They were ordered together and they said they were shipped together but the headset wasn't in the box.

I thought it was a good and very affordable product, but with my first purchase of this same item I was disappointed because it came bad from the factory and I had to return it and when I went to the Walmart super center store in customer service they treated me badly, and they didn't believe what I told you about the article

I use regularly but it's not my fave. My cheap headphone from Amazon is louder than these. I do like the size of them and it stays charged for a very long time (I rarely charge it) 

Also, it kind of hurt my ears overtime but if you adjust from time to time you'll be alright 

I give it a 7/10 I wish it was louder

It was a gift from the hubby on Christmas day and I love them. The sound quality and everything is great. The only thing I don't like is the white part that goes on your ear because it does make you sweat and with the sweat you're constantly cleaning them. Other than that I love them so much. I'm a pink girl so I really enjoy the rose gold color.

They did not deliver the package. Did not follow instructions and I waited for them. They wouldn't even leave it with the concierge. Told them that they couldn't leave it with them and left with my order. I waited for this order with so many failed attempts I am very disappointed. I can not review an item if I can't even get it.

the beats' headphones are great. i bought two pairs, and the girls won't take them off. they love them, and now i have to tap them for them to hear me. that means the noise function works very well. they are happy, but now i have to go up and down the stairs to get their attention.

Delivery was canceled supposedly they attempted to deliver.  I was home and my Ring did not show anyone trying to deliver.  I know that Walmart does not deliver but they don't provide any other information other than my order is on hold and it may cancel order.  This was a Christmas present for my son he wanted.

My grandson already had a headphone set, but I knew it was old.  So I bought him a new pair of Beats.  I had no idea he would be would be so excited.  Technology has grown beyond my knowledge, so I just took a chance at what looked good to me when I bought the Beats headset.  My grandson showed me what was so great about the Beats, including the comfort, adjustability, and sound quality.  So I guess I made a good decision buying something called BEATS.

Imagine my joy when FedEx finally pulled up. Love them.  Sturdy and sits nice on my ears. Not tight at all. Some Folks  complain it hurts their ears, may be they have a big head. Ijs. But the soundâ¦â¦.geeeeeeeeeez. Crisp and clean and loud and clear. Imma be soooo cute tomorrow at the gym. 1/2 the ppl at the gym have these very headphones and the other 1/2 have AirPods.  Soooooo excited ððð

The online price was very satisfactory. However, they could not give me a gift receipt and this was a secret Santa gift. So I had to go to another store that had the product in stock. Return the original online purchase. Then argue with the customer service desk to get them to honor the price I have originally paid for online. The explanation I got in the Rocky Hill Connecticut store from the service desk manager was that walmart.com. It is not associated with the Walmart store and it was not their issue or problem. She did eventually after a lengthy discussion. Agree to honor the online price this one time. But the whole process took me more than half a day to complete. I will never order from Walmart online again no matter how much the price is discounted. The service was terrible, and nobody wanted to speak to me or help.

I liked the price and receiving them the same day as advertised.I still have not received my Nintendo Switch which was advertised to be delivered the same day and it took 2 weeks to be delivered to my door.Fed Ex has a picture of it being delivered,I filed a police report of it being stolen,reported it too my debit card company,also to Fed Ex  and neither will do anything about it just like Walmart wont do anything.So I paid for an item which was advertised to be delivered same day,waited nearly 2 week's,requested to sign for The Nintendo switch and Fed Ex left it at my door where it obviously was taken by someone other than myself.So Walmart who false advertised same day delivery wont take any kind of responsibility,my kid still hasn't received his Christmas present and now my bank and Fed Ex just like Walmart will not do anything so I disappointed my son and even better lost nearly 400.00 dollars.I just wanted and still do want the item for my son.Completely ridiculous that nobody will take any responsibility for the consumer(myself) who did absolutely nothing wrong but order a Nintendo Switch for my son for Christmas.I would sue if i could afford it but it still would not get me my item and cost a fortune.I blame Walmart for false advertisement and also not letting Fed Ex know I needed to sign for item.I did receive the Beats headphones the same day the Nintendo switch was left at my door.How can this even be legal?The police,Walmart,Fed Ex and Chase Bank all are passing the buck and I just wanted and still do just wanted the item for my son.SMH
reviews.review_title: Received them same day as advertised.

reviews.review_text: I bought these for my wife on blk friday sale. My wife loves them. She uses it for the gym, laying around listening to music, and on her computer. She says they are comfortable and pretty good with canceling out other sounds around her. (note: she is hearing impaired) She says it sounds good and clear, and the only disappointment she has, is that the music isn't as loud as she would like. . Only thing she doesn't like is the case that came with them. She says it's hard to get them in and out, so she stop trying to use it. so overall it was worth the money, my wife is very happy with them.
reviews.review_title: Got them for my wife on blk friday deal

reviews.review_text:
A package from Walmart arrived at my address after being shipped to my home sans the headphones I ordered. 

I had noticed that the box delivered felt empty, and that the usual tamper-evident tape was missing and replaced with clear tape. It became apparent that some Grinch of a human being had removed and taken the On-Ear Headphones I purchased from their packaging at some point during the shipping transit period.

I'd give zero stars if I could for Walmart's Customer Service Department's lack of care or concern when I called in to address my issue with the unfulfilled delivery of the On-Ear Headphones I had ordered. 

I have since disputed the charge from Walmart with my credit card company.
reviews.review_title: Beware of Boxes with Clear Tape!

reviews.review_text: They're cool looking but very small like their children headphones honestly or if you have a small head these should be fine but if your an adult looking for some good headphones avoid these and avoid the refund and business days after you have to return them

I was contemplating 2 different brands of headphones; Bose and Beats. I decided to save some money and purchased the Beats, my first pair. I am very happy I did. Not only was I able to get them in pink but the sound quality is off the chain. I've always been a Bose fan but the brand is exceedingly expensive and honestly, I doubt I'll miss it. Nice bass, soft comfortable ear pads and affordable. What's not to love?

I bought these for my husband, but he has a bigger head than the headphones would fit. so we returned them. They were really good on sound. I love beats and have other models of beats, had his head fit them, we would've kept them! lol. They're more of a fit for a smaller head.

I liked that they are comfortable around the ears, and that when they are on they just tune out everything! I think that they are better than airpods and the airpod pro max. Even when your not playing any music it still tunes out people, I think these are good for when you don't want to be bothered with anybody. I highly recommended!

My Beats Solo3 are a musical companion. The bass gives life to my playlists, and the wireless freedom is a game-changer. They're a style statement, and the long battery life means uninterrupted beats during my day. A tad bass-heavy, but that's just the rhythm of these headphones.

I was a little disappointed. The item shows to appear its quality made. When I tried on head phones they are not as comfortable as I thought they would be with such an expensive price. It seams it was a down grade and quality materials for these items are listed for pre Black Friday/Christmas deals. for $99 I expected a higher quality product.

I have the original screenshot of where it was left and for the 5th time in as many weeks was delivered to the wrong house again!  I notified you immediately and Lo and Behold, it showed up on my porch, NO AWNING! Your business is seriously lacking in Quality Control!!!

My daughter loves how they feel and sound. With other headphones, we could hear her music even when she had it at a reasonable volume but these are much better. I would say they aren't as noise canceling as I was expecting but overall we are satisfied with these headphones.

First order had to cancel which was cheaper price never received second order I had to actually go to the store to get at higher price. The store would not honor the lower price I had purchased in my order I never received. The headphones work well but not happy with the company I put them from

I absolutely love these headphones. I had a refurbished purple and pink pair, but had to retire them and got the rose gold in their place! The sound is amazing, fit comfortably(coming from someone with stretched earlobes), and overall love them. 10/10 would recommend!

I ordered these along w/ 2 other items for delivery.  I received the 2 other items, but not these.  I was STILL charged for these.  It clearly shows in the delivery picture that there is no way on earth these are in the walmart bag.  Via chat they refuse to help.  Said to take it up with my bank.  Seriously???  If they open their eyes they will see the errors on their end.  I am currently on hold to talk to someone via phone and have waited 20 minutes.  A complete and utter waste of my time.  Terrible customer service.  I don't recommend you purchase these.
reviews.review_title: Don't purchase - Walmart is not helpful

reviews.review_text: I bought a set for my landscaping job so I can listen to music while I cut grass but iv had to replace these headphones twice within one year and now going on a 3rd time for the right speaking going out out not charging/turning on. there not build to last! The sound quality is great but donât expect to use them everyday for a long period of time they just go out at any moment and I wouldnât recommend it based on poor durability.

These were a Christmas gift for my daughter. She really loves them. She is used to air pods that go inside your ears. These go over the ears. She just needs to get used to them is all. The quality of sound is great though. Try them and Im sure you will love them too.

The color rose gold is beautiful. I purchased this headset for a daughter who is in college and they are great study essentials.  Able to hear when her name is being called, but also block out necessary background noise when she is studying or doing assignments. Great headset for working out in the gym.
reviews.review_title: Good sound quality! So compact and perfect!

reviews.review_text: Got these on flash deal for my daughter for Christmas since her old ones finally died. They arrived on time %26 the insurance on it is totally worth it! Don't skimp on that. The color is beautiful %26 the case they come with is perfectly sized for travel!

Sounds good but I have Edifier headphones half the price that sound as good. The Edifiers have a 95 hour battery life. This part is my fault but should be stated, these are on ear not over. I was hoping they would be comfortable after wearing for hours. They are not.

These headphones are perfect for kids and adults who can't wear earbuds. They are so comfortable and have a clear sound and block out other noises. The best thing about them is you don't have to have wires plugged into your phone or any electronics they pair with.

The sound, phenomenal! It's loud but not overpowering where it hurts your ears. Blocks out noise, if someone is trying to talk to you with them on, you're likely to not hear them, which is a plus for me, and the battery life is INCREDIBLE! Since I've got them, I think I've only charged them once and even then, they really didn't even need it

These are soooo nice and adjustable, just if it's your first it might seem like it doesn't fit in the bag just put the things back to normal if you stretched them. They are so loud when full volume and the volume is really good quality. 100% RECOMMEND!

Absolutely! Beats headphones are amazing. They deliver exceptional sound quality with deep bass and crisp highs. The design is sleek and stylish, and they're comfortable to wear for long periods. Whether you're listening to music or watching movies, Beats headphones provide an immersive audio experience. They're definitely worth considering!

I tried both Beats Solo %26 Beats Studio. Both have GREAT sound. Beats Studio is huge compared to the Solos. The problem is, for me, they both gave me a headache. I'm not used to having headphones on my head for long periods of time. I usually wear earbuds. Again, the sound on these are AMAZING! Unfortunately, I will be returning these.

Honestly I didn't think I was going like this much but they do the job. The only thing I don't think is that they fall off easily but beside they are great. Sounds good and clear. Quite comfortable and not as big as the picture. The case/pouch is a little too small I struggle to put them inside of it.

I absolutely HATE that I never received my order, especially around the holidays and this seller is not able to resend or refund my money because of a photo taken by the person who delivered my package. It could have fell in the hands of ANYONE the moment the delivery guy left. I am highly upset angry and mad at this situation especially around the holidays!!!!!!!!! Wasted money!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I got these for my 14yr old daughter for Christmas, the color is a perfect dusty pink, sound is amazing..besides her ignoring me because they go up really loud. i have to tell her keep them down for safety reason but they are great. i would buy again if needed.

Great sound!! I am extremely pleased with the quality and workmanship of these headphones. I've been looking at them for some time now. WM had them at a discounted price, and I jumped on it. Ordered them on a Friday, and they were on my doorstep late the next day, gotta love that.

I was excited when I saw these were on sale, because I had bought a pair of beats for my son and they had great customer service and quality sound.  Great sound, value, and the noise cancelling feature was off the charts. Now these should come with a warning that a boa constrictor is included, as these earphones will squeeze the living daylights out of your head!

Got them on sale as a gift for someone. I have the solo pro (that they have discontinued) and figured this would be a good second. The sound quality isn't all of that and there's no noise canceling, or at least not significant. I wouldn't buy these again. Would probably just save up more and get the studio set. Beats really should put the solo pro back out- those are definitely worth it.

My daughter absolutely loves these headphones!! She has them on all the time and uses them for everything even in school!!!! The sound on them is excellent!!  I got them for her in December for her birthday and they are still holding strong!! Money well spent!!

I had a pair of Beats years ago... I love the new changes now with Bluetooth. The sound quality is great, the fit is comfortable, the price was amazing, and shipping was so fast. Huge plus to add a warranty for a cheap cost too. No complaints and I'm excited to use this product!

For starters I never actually received the item as it was delivered to the wrong address by FedEx and presumably stolen by said addressee or in their words âwe never seen itâ. After reporting it missing showing the proof that it was delivered to the wrong door. (FedEx took a picture showing the wrong door) The seller did nothing to help alleviate this issue. Did not offer me a refund, did not offer me a replacement. Instead Walmart gave me my refund. So thank you to Walmart. I will never be buying from this seller again due to the lack of customer service regardless of what the issue is. At the end of the day the fault lies with FedEx being negligent, yet it is always the Seller's duty to make sure the Customer receives stalwart service, and they did not do anything, Walmart did.

The noise cancellation doesn't really work. They are cute and fairly comfortable. If you have a lot of jewelry on your ears then I would recommend buying the larger beats instead of these. I think they are overpriced for the quality. I am able to workout and climb in these without them falling off, so that's definitely a plus.

The sound quality is great!

I recently had another pair of wireless headphones. They had great sound quality, the over the ear design was extremely comfortable and seems you had all the sound. Downfall was when paired with my TV, it would only turn up so loud.

The Beats, like I said have great sound. But the muffs are about the same size as my ears, so it does get uncomfortable. I do like the folding design but the bag it comes in is a no.

So, I'd give them a 3 out of 5.

Just one more thing.
The headphones that I mentioned I had right before the Beats, a friend liked them so much I gave them to him.
I bought them on TEMU.
Would also rate them 4 out of 5.
They also came with a nice case, it had a nice fold option.

Um, quite cheaper.
reviews.review_title: Good, but thought would be better

reviews.review_text:
I definitely love My Beats Solo!!
They fit very comfortably and you can adjust them to your comfort level. The best part for me is the sound proof quality. For me personally I can't hear anything other than the music, when I'm shopping or just walking through the neighborhood.

Got them two years ago they still sound like the first day ð®ð they're so comfy i wear them to the gym every day and they never fall off! The battery also lasts me about 3 days at a time I've never had a connectivity issue what more can i ask for

These headphones have a normal-above average sound quality, I've heard better but I've heard worse. They have an amazing battery life it lasts my whole school week. They aren't the most comfortable though it hurts the top of my ears.
reviews.review_title: Best battery life, not very comfy.

client_responses.name: Adrian H.
client_responses.response: Thank you for the feedback. Adrian H.

reviews.review_text: This product is so easy and fun to use. These are super nice and noise canceling and great to wear to sports. They don't take long to charge and are super cute and have multiple colors.

Beats by Dr.Dre - the best headphones you can trust to bring the ultimate surrounding sound and immersive musical experience. The cover is soft and comfortable on your ears. Connectivity is great with bluetooth.

I love my Beats By Dre headphones. I use them pretty much every day. The audio quality is great. I love that it easily connects to all of my Apple products. It can easily connect to my iPhone, iPad, and Apple TV with the simple click of a button.

client_responses.name: Adrian H.
client_responses.response: I am glad to hear you enjoy them and they are easy to use. Adrian H.

reviews.review_text: good product great sound quality makes me feel like im in what ever im watching and it has good bass can feel it when music is all the wayy up and great for multiple uses

The Beats Solo 3 wireless headphones offer a compelling blend of style, comfort, and audio performance. From the moment you put them on, the sleek design and premium build quality make a statement. The on-ear design, coupled with plush ear cushions, provides a comfortable fit that's conducive to extended listening sessions without causing discomfort.

When it comes to audio quality, the Solo 3 headphones are distinctly Beats. The emphasis on bass is evident, providing a powerful and thumping low end that caters to fans of genres like hip-hop and electronic music. However, the headphones manage to maintain clarity in the mids and highs, ensuring a well-rounded listening experience across various genres.

One standout feature is the impressive battery life. With up to 40 hours of playback on a single charge, these headphones outlast many competitors in the wireless category. This extended battery life is a game-changer for users who are constantly on the move or forget to charge their devices regularly.

The seamless Bluetooth connectivity adds another layer of convenience. Pairing the headphones with your device is quick and hassle-free, and the wireless range allows you to move around without losing connection quality. The on-ear controls make it easy to adjust volume, skip tracks, or take calls without reaching for your device.

While the price point may be on the higher side, the combination of premium design, impressive battery life, and the signature Beats audio profile justifies the investment for those who prioritize both aesthetics and sound quality. In conclusion, the Beats Solo 3 wireless headphones deliver a compelling package for users seeking a stylish and high-performing audio accessory.
reviews.review_title: Harmony in Style and Sound: Unveiling the Beats Solo 3 Symphony

reviews.review_text: These headphones have been my everyday go to!! I take it with me to the gym all the time and it keeps me in the zone with its great sound. Honestly, even though it's not advertised as noice cancelling, I feel as though I can't really hear much of my surroundings with these on; in my opinion that is a major plus!
reviews.review_title: Amazing sound with long lasting battery life

reviews.review_text: I've had these headphones for about 2 years now and they've been the best. I like to use them when I'm going out on a run or doing exercise. They don't slide off my ears and I like that it doesn't make my ears feel uncomfortable. I would definitely recommended these headphones to everyone.

Got these the other day and really like them! The battery life holds up great and it's super easy to connect to Bluetooth. I find them super comfortable to wear and the design is very sleek! As for the sound quality, I think it's great. Although you definitely need to make sure you have the right side on each ear, otherwise the person on the other end of a call has a hard time hearing you. I also think the only other thing I would prefer of the studios are that they have noise cancellation
I just got them the sound is going from one ear to another that's bad
Good quality for great price! Black Friday deal!
The sound quality is great, the microphone works very well and it lasts for a long time but if you wear glasses it does start hurting after a little while.

The Beats Solo3 headphones deliver an impressive audio experience, with powerful bass and clear highs. Their wireless capabilities make them convenient for on-the-go use, and the long battery life ensures extended listening sessions. The sleek design and comfortable fit contribute to an enjoyable overall wearing experience. While the price point may be on the higher side, the combination of sound quality, wireless functionality, and comfort make the Beats Solo3 a compelling choice for music enthusiasts.

I've had these for almost a year and they work really well! They're pretty song, I've broken a lot of electronics in my time but these work just as perfect as they did in the first day! ð¥²
I usually only have to charge them once a week, maybe even two, and I do use them on a daily basis so they're battery life is just perfect! ð
One thing I'd say though is that my hair did get suck in them a lot until Ive learnt how to avoid that which by then I had lost many little ones ð
reviews.review_title: Works great! Hair used to get stuck in it though

reviews.review_text: The sound quality of these beats are 10/10. They are the best wireless headphones I've ever used. They're super comfortable, and can adjust easily. They have great battery life, lasting for days for me. They are very durable and i love how you can fold them up! These are the best.

The headphones is high quality but it doesn't hold up to time. I have been using Beats for 6 months and it broke down on me. The battery is charging and there is power. But it doesn't connect. I've tried resetting it by pressing the power button and volume down. It showed promise but it did not work. I am just hoping that either Apple Warranty or the Insurance I bought from Walmart will cover this.
reviews.review_title: Good in the beginning until it broke

reviews.review_text: I was looking for beats for a bit. I had looked everywhere for the best deal. Then, I found these babies at a PHENOMENAL price online. Nobody else came close! My daughter uses them every day and loves them. They do everything they are described as and were so happy to come across these at such a phenomenal price. The best part is we didn't have to wait for shipping (or pay for shipping), and I was able to pick them up the same day. I love deals like this for hard-working parents. They hold up well and are noise canceling. Great buy!
reviews.review_title: Excellent beats at a GREAT price!

reviews.review_text: My son loves these headphones, but one side always stops working after abt a year or so. Def buy the warranty , we have had abt 6 pairs of these and like I said one side always stops working. We don't fold them or anything like you would to put them in the case. He takes them off and sets them on the desk until the next day. I always get the warranty no matter where I buy them and always have used it without issue, although Walmart warranty did give me the most trouble to use, they did finally replace them for me .
I never bought a pair of beats before I always thought they were overrated, I was mistaken. This is a great product.
My mom bought gf t them and she is in love with them. They're not too loud and not to low. We love them.
Noise cancellation is very good and the padding is very nice around your ears. They have a very long battery life, I haven't charged them this week and they still have a good charge.

client_responses.name: Adrian H.
client_responses.response: I am glad to hear they are working out for you. Adrian H.

reviews.review_text: I'm trying to get a hold of the insurance for the beats headphones. I purchased the insurance just in case we would need it and we do overall they're great except for one side don't work. it's been almost a year I'm glad I got the warranty
reviews.review_title: birthday present one side not working

reviews.review_text: These Beat Solo 3's are very fantastic and have great sound quality. As well as the battery life is very good and it lasts a long time!! They aren't too comfortable though.

client_responses.response: Thank you for your feedback, we truly appreciate it.

reviews.review_text: I love the beats wireless headphones. Battery life seems to be very good . They are comfortable and easy to operate.  Seem to be very durable as I wear them while mowing. They have superb sound quality.

These headphones by dr. dre beats 3 are the best headphones I found so far love the sound quality so nice and clear. The comfortnes and durability of this product are amazing. The connectivity and battery life is on point.

These beats are nice. they work very well. But my problem with them was that they were small. They can probably fit a child or a 13 year old but as an adult these seemed like headphones they were meant for children.
Great sound. My only complaint would be, after wearing them for an hour or so, your ears start to feel sore. I wish they were a little more comfortable.
Bought these for my boyfriends birthday! My dad had a pair %26 I fell inlove. My boyfriend works physical labor and these are will not fall out of his ear ð
Second pair we buy. First one fell in the bath top and got waisted. We then bought cheaper headphones but lasted no time. We got these at a great price. Great quality and sound.
reviews.review_title: Got them at a great price!

reviews.review_text: Love the price drop and was happy it was on rollback for a while so I could save my money to order it. Never sold out and was available in the color that I wanted

The sound quality and overall quality of the product were amazing. It was much stronger than I was expecting with great durability and fast charging. I use these headphones for the gym, and I really have no complaints. However, the sound does leak out a bit when played at near or full volume, and the on ear is a little uncomfortable after being worn in the gym for a few hours, but these headphones are very strong and reliable while keeping good quality with sound and material design I recommend these for gym rats.

Availability of the item was the main reason that I bought from Walmart.  I had checked numerous places, only to find the color and item were out of stock.  This was a birthday gift for my granddaughter and this was the only thing on her wish list.  I was thrilled to get both the Beats wireless headphones in the color she wanted and the case to match. Thrilled!
